channel.title: The Forums/Status Checker (PLEASE HELP)
channel.description:
Ok Heres my horrible problem for 2 days i think now moparscape website haas been running very slow on my other computer its a decent system and did run the website good but now its really slow :confused: its horrible because i love reading the forums and i have to use another computer please help !
Info:
PC SYSTEM 1.7ghz 896mb ram 80 gb HD Windows XP
Internet speed 100.0Mbps
Is it my computer or the website because when i try to get on to register my server and when i complete the form it says like the offline page, And for when i go on the forums after the i agree bit and i have agreed for cookies !!
PLEASE HELP
Also, It is sort of slow on this computer and this is
1.60ghz X2 1024mb Ram 80 Gb HD Vista Basic

item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

I’ve bought a somewhat said to be 500Mbps package from Etisalat.

Read full topic

item.title: The Forums/Status Checker (PLEASE HELP)
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Yeah I have noticed that too. akl is right. This is hosted on an SMF and SMF is having some problems. It’s not your computer don’t worry. Or your internet. Its SMF.

Read full topic

item.title: The Forums/Status Checker (PLEASE HELP)
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

I don’t think there is a problem with the computers. This forum is being run on an SMF host, and SMF has been having some problems lately. Some of their users have also got replies from accessing their forums saying “Invalid blah blah”
Therefore there must be a problem with the host.
Hope I helped.

Read full topic
